note.q: Irregularly numbered. Some handwritten corrections and notes. A letter includes a bill by "S.Calvary and Co." Includes a photocopy of a paper slip with handwritten note. Includes the trascription of a letter sent by the minister Lehnert to Gerhard and a circular sent by Gerhard to all his co-workers.
